text: p2go is SAAS version of the payment hub offered to the bank
p2go is hosted on azure cloud as of now but i think it can be hosted on other cloud platforms too
p2go has mostly american customers although european customers are in pipeline
Most of customers of p2go are having FED payment rail
FED payment rail will undego modernisation called as FED ISO where by all proprietary messages will go away and iso formats will be adopted
